Articles.Content:
So I was reading the readme, and saw this:

- Added a FlagDecal part module. Allows any part to have a part of its model textured with the selected flag.

Sounds pretty cool. Only problem is, I have no idea how to do this. Is there some special part in the editor that you place? Is there a setting that I looked over?

If anyone could tell me what to do, I'd appreciate it.

This is a method to add the currently selected flag texture to a specially marked element of a specially made model through part.cfg

I.e. at the moment no models exist to make use of this functionality, give it a few days.
